highlights.title: E-commerce Platform Modernization
highlights.context: Legacy monolith system dengan performa rendah dan maintenance cost tinggi yang menghambat growth bisnis
highlights.challenge: System tidak scalable, deployment process manual, dan frequent downtime pada peak traffic
actions: Lead migration dari monolith ke microservices architecture
Implement Next.js 14 dengan App Router untuk frontend modernization
Setup CI/CD pipeline dengan automated testing dan blue-green deployment
Optimize database queries dan implement Redis caching strategy
highlights.impact: Revenue increase 30% due to better UX dan reduced cart abandonment

highlights.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
highlights.context: Tim sales membutuhkan insight real-time untuk decision making yang cepat dan accurate
highlights.challenge: Data pipeline existing memiliki latency 5 menit dan dashboard tidak responsive
actions: Build real-time dashboard dengan React dan WebSocket integration
Implement optimized data pipeline dengan stream processing
Design responsive UI dengan charts dan KPI widgets
Setup automated alerting system untuk anomaly detection
highlights.impact: Sales team mampu respond 10x lebih cepat terhadap market changes

highlights.title: API Gateway & Microservices Architecture
highlights.context: Multiple teams dengan different tech stack dan inconsistent API standards menyebabkan integration hell
highlights.challenge: Development velocity lambat dan integration antar services memakan waktu weeks
actions: Design unified API gateway dengan standardized protocols
Implement comprehensive API documentation dengan OpenAPI 3.0
Setup centralized monitoring dan logging system
Create developer portal dengan interactive API testing
results: 95% developer satisfaction score pada internal survey
highlights.impact: Engineering productivity boost enable faster time-to-market

timeline.title: Senior Software Engineer
timeline.description: Leading frontend development team untuk enterprise applications dengan focus pada performance optimization dan user experience.
highlights: Lead team of 5 developers dalam modernization project
Implement design system yang digunakan oleh 3 product teams
Achieve 40% improvement pada application performance metrics

timeline.title: Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: Develop dan maintain multiple web applications untuk startup di bidang e-commerce dan fintech.
highlights: Build e-commerce platform dari scratch dengan Next.js
Implement payment gateway integration dengan multiple providers
Setup CI/CD pipeline yang reduce deployment time 60%

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Develop responsive web applications untuk klien corporate dan government.
highlights: Lead adoption of React dan modern frontend tools

timeline.title: Junior Web Developer
timeline.description: Start karir sebagai web developer dengan focus pada HTML, CSS, dan JavaScript fundamentals.
highlights: Learn modern JavaScript (ES6+) dan React ecosystem
Contribute ke team projects dengan quality code
Rapid learning curve dan adaptasi dengan new technologies

timeline.title: Sarjana Teknik Informatika
timeline.description: Bachelor degree dalam Computer Science dengan specialization di Software Engineering.
highlights: Final project: Web-based Learning Management System
Active di komunitas programming dan tech events

timeline.title: Meta Front-End Developer Certificate
timeline.description: Complete professional certificate program focusing on modern frontend development practices.
highlights: Master React advanced patterns dan performance optimization
Learn industry best practices untuk UI/UX development
Complete capstone project dengan real-world application
